entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_GRIPPER
entry.description: Mission command to operate EPM gripper.
entry.param: Gripper number (a number from 1 to max number of grippers on the vehicle).

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_ALTITUDE_WAIT
entry.description: Mission command to wait for an altitude or downwards vertical speed. This is meant for high altitude balloon launches, allowing the aircraft to be idle until either an altitude is reached or a negative vertical speed is reached (indicating early balloon burst). The wiggle time is how often to wiggle the control surfaces to prevent them seizing up.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_POWER_OFF_INITIATED
entry.description: A system wide power-off event has been initiated.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SOLO_BTN_FLY_HOLD
entry.description: FLY button has been held for 1.5 seconds.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SOLO_BTN_PAUSE_CLICK
entry.param: 1 if Solo is in a shot mode, 0 otherwise.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FIXED_MAG_CAL
entry.description: Magnetometer calibration based on fixed position in earth field given by inclination, declination and intensity.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FIXED_MAG_CAL_FIELD
entry.description: Magnetometer calibration based on fixed expected field values in milliGauss.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_START_MAG_CAL
entry.param: uint8_t bitmask of magnetometers (0 means all).

entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_ACCEPT_MAG_CAL
entry.param: uint8_t bitmask of magnetometers (0 means all).

entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_CANCEL_MAG_CAL
entry.param: uint8_t bitmask of magnetometers (0 means all).

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ACCELCAL_VEHICLE_POS
entry.description: Used when doing accelerometer calibration. When sent to the GCS tells it what position to put the vehicle in. When sent to the vehicle says what position the vehicle is in.
entry.param: Position, one of the ACCELCAL_VEHICLE_POS enum values.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_FACTORY_TEST_MODE
entry.description: Command autopilot to get into factory test/diagnostic mode.
entry.param: 0 means get out of test mode, 1 means get into test mode.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_GIMBAL_RESET
entry.description: Causes the gimbal to reset and boot as if it was just powered on.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_GIMBAL_AXIS_CALIBRATION_STATUS
entry.description: Reports progress and success or failure of gimbal axis calibration procedure.
entry.param: Gimbal axis we're reporting calibration progress for.
Current calibration progress for this axis, 0x64=100%.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_GIMBAL_REQUEST_AXIS_CALIBRATION
entry.description: Starts commutation calibration on the gimbal.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_WINCH
entry.param: Winch number (0 for the default winch, otherwise a number from 1 to max number of winches on the vehicle).
Action (0=relax, 1=relative length control, 2=rate control. See WINCH_ACTIONS enum.).
Release length (cable distance to unwind in meters, negative numbers to wind in cable).

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FLASH_BOOTLOADER
entry.param: Magic number - set to 290876 to actually flash

entry.name: MAV_CMD_BATTERY_RESET
entry.description: Reset battery capacity for batteries that accumulate consumed battery via integration.
entry.param: Bitmask of batteries to reset. Least significant bit is for the first battery.

entry.name: LIMITS_RECOVERED
entry.description: We're no longer in breach of a limit.

entry.name: FAVORABLE_WIND
entry.description: Flag set when requiring favorable winds for landing.

entry.name: LAND_IMMEDIATELY
entry.description: Flag set when plane is to immediately descend to break altitude and land without GCS intervention. Flag not set when plane is to loiter at Rally point until commanded to land.

entry.name: WINCH_RELATIVE_LENGTH_CONTROL
entry.description: Winch unwinds or winds specified length of cable optionally using specified rate.

entry.name: WINCH_RATE_CONTROL
entry.description: Winch unwinds or winds cable at specified rate in meters/seconds.

entry.name: CAMERA_STATUS_TYPE_HEARTBEAT
entry.description: Camera heartbeat, announce camera component ID at 1Hz.

entry.name: CAMERA_STATUS_TYPE_LOWBATT
entry.description: Camera battery low. Parameter p1 shows reported voltage.

entry.name: CAMERA_STATUS_TYPE_LOWSTORE
entry.description: Camera storage low. Parameter p1 shows reported shots remaining.

entry.name: CAMERA_STATUS_TYPE_LOWSTOREV
entry.description: Camera storage low. Parameter p1 shows reported video minutes remaining.

entry.name: CAMERA_FEEDBACK_BADEXPOSURE
entry.description: Unable to achieve requested exposure (e.g. shutter speed too low).

entry.name: CAMERA_FEEDBACK_CLOSEDLOOP
entry.description: Closed loop feedback from camera, we know for sure it has successfully taken a picture.

entry.name: CAMERA_FEEDBACK_OPENLOOP
entry.description: Open loop camera, an image trigger has been requested but we can't know for sure it has successfully taken a picture.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_UNINITIALIZED
entry.description: Gimbal is powered on but has not started initializing yet.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_CALIBRATING_PITCH
entry.description: Gimbal is currently running calibration on the pitch axis.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_CALIBRATING_ROLL
entry.description: Gimbal is currently running calibration on the roll axis.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_CALIBRATING_YAW
entry.description: Gimbal is currently running calibration on the yaw axis.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_INITIALIZED
entry.description: Gimbal has finished calibrating and initializing, but is relaxed pending reception of first rate command from copter.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_GIMBAL_RATE_CMD_TIMEOUT
entry.description: Gimbal is relaxed because it missed more than 10 expected rate command messages in a row. Gimbal will move back to active mode when it receives a new rate command.

entry.name: GIMBAL_AXIS_CALIBRATION_REQUIRED_UNKNOWN
entry.description: Whether or not this axis requires calibration is unknown at this time.

entry.name: GIMBAL_AXIS_CALIBRATION_REQUIRED_FALSE
entry.description: This axis does not require calibration.

entry.name: GOPRO_HEARTBEAT_STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE
entry.description: The detected GoPro is not HeroBus compatible.

entry.name: GOPRO_HEARTBEAT_STATUS_CONNECTED
entry.description: A HeroBus compatible GoPro is connected.

entry.name: GOPRO_HEARTBEAT_STATUS_ERROR
entry.description: An unrecoverable error was encountered with the connected GoPro, it may require a power cycle.

entry.name: GOPRO_REQUEST_SUCCESS
entry.description: The write message with ID indicated succeeded.

entry.name: GOPRO_REQUEST_FAILED
entry.description: The write message with ID indicated failed.

entry.name: GOPRO_CAPTURE_MODE_PLAYBACK
entry.description: Playback mode, Hero 4 only, silver only except when LCD or HDMI is connected to black.

entry.name: GOPRO_MODEL_HERO_3_PLUS_SILVER
entry.description: Hero 3+ Silver (HeroBus not supported by GoPro).

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_PATTERN_OFF
entry.description: LED patterns off (return control to regular vehicle control).

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_PATTERN_FIRMWAREUPDATE
entry.description: LEDs show pattern during firmware update.

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_PATTERN_CUSTOM
entry.description: Custom Pattern using custom bytes fields.

entry.name: EKF_ATTITUDE
entry.description: Set if EKF's attitude estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_VELOCITY_HORIZ
entry.description: Set if EKF's horizontal velocity estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_VELOCITY_VERT
entry.description: Set if EKF's vertical velocity estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_POS_HORIZ_REL
entry.description: Set if EKF's horizontal position (relative) estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_POS_HORIZ_ABS
entry.description: Set if EKF's horizontal position (absolute) estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_POS_VERT_ABS
entry.description: Set if EKF's vertical position (absolute) estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_POS_VERT_AGL
entry.description: Set if EKF's vertical position (above ground) estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_CONST_POS_MODE
entry.description: EKF is in constant position mode and does not know it's absolute or relative position.

entry.name: EKF_PRED_POS_HORIZ_REL
entry.description: Set if EKF's predicted horizontal position (relative) estimate is good.

entry.name: EKF_PRED_POS_HORIZ_ABS
entry.description: Set if EKF's predicted horizontal position (absolute) estimate is good.

enum.name: MAV_REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK_COMMANDS
enum.description: Special ACK block numbers control activation of dataflash log streaming.

entry.name: MAV_REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK_STOP
entry.description: UAV to stop sending DataFlash blocks.

entry.name: MAV_REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK_START
entry.description: UAV to start sending DataFlash blocks.

enum.name: MAV_REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK_STATUSES
enum.description: Possible remote log data block statuses.

entry.name: MAV_REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK_NACK
entry.description: This block has NOT been received.

entry.name: DEEPSTALL_STAGE_ESTIMATE_WIND
entry.description: Building an estimate of the wind.

entry.name: DEEPSTALL_STAGE_WAIT_FOR_BREAKOUT
entry.description: Waiting to breakout of the loiter to fly the approach.

entry.name: DEEPSTALL_STAGE_FLY_TO_ARC
entry.description: Flying to the first arc point to turn around to the landing point.

entry.name: DEEPSTALL_STAGE_ARC
entry.description: Turning around back to the deepstall landing point.

entry.name: DEEPSTALL_STAGE_LAND
entry.description: Stalling and steering towards the land point.

enum.name: PLANE_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of plane flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

enum.name: COPTER_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of copter flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

enum.name: SUB_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of sub flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

enum.name: ROVER_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of rover flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

enum.name: TRACKER_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of antenna tracker flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

message.name: SENSOR_OFFSETS
message.description: Offsets and calibrations values for hardware sensors. This makes it easier to debug the calibration process.

message.name: DIGICAM_CONFIGURE
message.field: Mode enumeration from 1 to N //P, TV, AV, M, etc. (0 means ignore).
F stop number x 10 //e.g. 28 means 2.8 (0 means ignore).
ISO enumeration from 1 to N //e.g. 80, 100, 200, Etc (0 means ignore).
Exposure type enumeration from 1 to N (0 means ignore).
Command Identity (incremental loop: 0 to 255). //A command sent multiple times will be executed or pooled just once.
Main engine cut-off time before camera trigger (0 means no cut-off).

message.name: DIGICAM_CONTROL
message.description: Control on-board Camera Control System to take shots.
message.field: 0: stop, 1: start or keep it up //Session control e.g. show/hide lens.
1 to N //Zoom's absolute position (0 means ignore).
-100 to 100 //Zooming step value to offset zoom from the current position.
0: unlock focus or keep unlocked, 1: lock focus or keep locked, 3: re-lock focus.
Command Identity (incremental loop: 0 to 255)//A command sent multiple times will be executed or pooled just once.

message.name: MOUNT_CONFIGURE
message.description: Message to configure a camera mount, directional antenna, etc.

message.name: MOUNT_CONTROL
message.description: Message to control a camera mount, directional antenna, etc.
message.field: Pitch (centi-degrees) or lat (degE7), depending on mount mode.
Roll (centi-degrees) or lon (degE7) depending on mount mode.
Yaw (centi-degrees) or alt (cm) depending on mount mode.
If "1" it will save current trimmed position on EEPROM (just valid for NEUTRAL and LANDING).

message.name: MOUNT_STATUS
message.description: Message with some status from APM to GCS about camera or antenna mount.

message.name: FENCE_POINT
message.description: A fence point. Used to set a point when from GCS -> MAV. Also used to return a point from MAV -> GCS.
message.field: Point index (first point is 1, 0 is for return point).
Total number of points (for sanity checking).

message.name: FENCE_FETCH_POINT
message.description: Request a current fence point from MAV.
message.field: Point index (first point is 1, 0 is for return point).

message.name: FENCE_STATUS
message.description: Status of geo-fencing. Sent in extended status stream when fencing enabled.
message.field: Breach status (0 if currently inside fence, 1 if outside).

message.name: SIMSTATE
message.description: Status of simulation environment, if used.

message.name: RADIO
message.field: How full the tx buffer is.

message.name: LIMITS_STATUS
message.description: Status of AP_Limits. Sent in extended status stream when AP_Limits is enabled.
message.field: Time (since boot) of last recovery action.
Time (since boot) of last successful recovery.

message.name: WIND
message.field: Wind direction (that wind is coming from).

message.name: RANGEFINDER
message.field: Raw voltage if available, zero otherwise.

message.name: RALLY_POINT
message.description: A rally point. Used to set a point when from GCS -> MAV. Also used to return a point from MAV -> GCS.
message.field: Total number of points (for sanity checking).
Transit / loiter altitude relative to home.
Heading to aim for when landing.

message.name: RALLY_FETCH_POINT
message.description: Request a current rally point from MAV. MAV should respond with a RALLY_POINT message. MAV should not respond if the request is invalid.

message.name: AHRS2
message.description: Status of secondary AHRS filter if available.

message.name: CAMERA_STATUS
message.field: Image timestamp (since UNIX epoch, according to camera clock).
Parameter 1 (meaning depends on event_id, see CAMERA_STATUS_TYPES enum).
Parameter 2 (meaning depends on event_id, see CAMERA_STATUS_TYPES enum).
Parameter 3 (meaning depends on event_id, see CAMERA_STATUS_TYPES enum).
Parameter 4 (meaning depends on event_id, see CAMERA_STATUS_TYPES enum).

message.name: CAMERA_FEEDBACK
message.field: Image timestamp (since UNIX epoch), as passed in by CAMERA_STATUS message (or autopilot if no CCB).

message.name: BATTERY2
message.field: Battery current, -1: autopilot does not measure the current.

message.name: AHRS3
message.description: Status of third AHRS filter if available. This is for ANU research group (Ali and Sean).

message.name: AUTOPILOT_VERSION_REQUEST
message.description: Request the autopilot version from the system/component.

message.name: REMOTE_LOG_DATA_BLOCK
message.description: Send a block of log data to remote location.

message.name: REMOTE_LOG_BLOCK_STATUS
message.description: Send Status of each log block that autopilot board might have sent.

message.name: LED_CONTROL
message.field: Instance (LED instance to control or 255 for all LEDs).

message.name: MAG_CAL_PROGRESS
message.field: Body frame direction vector for display.
Body frame direction vector for display.
Body frame direction vector for display.

message.name: MAG_CAL_REPORT
message.description: Reports results of completed compass calibration. Sent until MAG_CAL_ACK received.

message.name: EKF_STATUS_REPORT
message.description: EKF Status message including flags and variances.

message.name: DEEPSTALL
message.field: Distance the aircraft expects to travel during the deepstall.
Deepstall cross track error (only valid when in DEEPSTALL_STAGE_LAND).

message.name: GOPRO_HEARTBEAT
message.description: Heartbeat from a HeroBus attached GoPro.

message.name: GOPRO_GET_REQUEST
message.description: Request a GOPRO_COMMAND response from the GoPro.

message.name: GOPRO_GET_RESPONSE
message.description: Response from a GOPRO_COMMAND get request.

message.name: GOPRO_SET_REQUEST
message.description: Request to set a GOPRO_COMMAND with a desired.

message.name: GOPRO_SET_RESPONSE
message.description: Response from a GOPRO_COMMAND set request.

message.name: DEVICE_OP_READ
message.field: Name of device on bus (for SPI).

message.name: DEVICE_OP_READ_REPLY
message.field: 0 for success, anything else is failure code.

message.name: DEVICE_OP_WRITE
message.field: Name of device on bus (for SPI).

message.name: DEVICE_OP_WRITE_REPLY
message.field: 0 for success, anything else is failure code.

message.name: VISION_POSITION_DELTA
message.description: Camera vision based attitude and position deltas.
message.field: Timestamp (synced to UNIX time or since system boot).
Time since the last reported camera frame.
Defines a rotation vector in body frame that rotates the vehicle from the previous to the current orientation.
Change in position from previous to current frame rotated into body frame (0=forward, 1=right, 2=down).

message.name: AOA_SSA
message.description: Angle of Attack and Side Slip Angle.

message.name: ESC_TELEMETRY_1_TO_4
message.description: ESC Telemetry Data for ESCs 1 to 4, matching data sent by BLHeli ESCs.
message.field: count of telemetry packets received (wraps at 65535).

message.name: ESC_TELEMETRY_5_TO_8
message.description: ESC Telemetry Data for ESCs 5 to 8, matching data sent by BLHeli ESCs.
message.field: count of telemetry packets received (wraps at 65535).

message.name: ESC_TELEMETRY_9_TO_12
message.description: ESC Telemetry Data for ESCs 9 to 12, matching data sent by BLHeli ESCs.
message.field: count of telemetry packets received (wraps at 65535).
